current_role.title: Solution Architect, DevOps

Delivered 50% reduction in operational costs and 40% improvement in product performance

Redesigned legacy EdTech products into automated, AI-driven systems using LLM integration
Led cross-functional team for Addy AI - LLM-based U.S. healthcare provider back-office automation
